senselogic.sitevision.api.versioning

Interface VersionUtil

  • All Superinterfaces:
    VelocityAccess.VersionUtilConstants

    @Requireable(value="VersionUtil")
public interface VersionUtil
extends VelocityAccess.VersionUtilConstants
    Versioning utility interface.

    An instance of the Sitevision class implementing this interface can be obtained via Utils.getVersionUtil(). See Utils for how to obtain an instance of the Utils interface.

    Since:
    Sitevision 2.6.1_04
    Author:
    Mikael Wikblom

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int OFFLINE_VERSION
      The offline version (i.e. the version used when editing in the Sitevision editor) marker
      static int ONLINE_VERSION
      The online version (i.e. the published version that visitors can access) marker

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getCurrentVersion()
      Gets current version

      • Methods inherited from interface senselogic.sitevision.api.render.velocity.VelocityAccess.VersionUtilConstants

        getOFFLINE_VERSION, getONLINE_VERSION

    • Field Detail

      • OFFLINE_VERSION

        static final int OFFLINE_VERSION
        The offline version (i.e. the version used when editing in the Sitevision editor) marker
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ONLINE_VERSION

        static final int ONLINE_VERSION
        The online version (i.e. the published version that visitors can access) marker
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentVersion

        int getCurrentVersion()
        Gets current version
        Returns:
        OFFLINE_VERSION or ONLINE_VERSION. If current version is undeterminable, -1 is returned.

Sitevision - Portal and Content Management Made Easy
Sitevision is an advanced Java enterprise portal product and a portlet container (JSR 286) that implements Java Content Repository (JSR 283).
